game.name: Flowers
game.description: Connect the roots of all the flowers and fill the whole board to complete the level! Each level it will get a bit more challenging, so try to complete all of them! Finish a level with as few moves as possible to increase your score.
game.metaTitle: Flowers, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Flowers at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Flowers Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE TO  CONNECT THE TWO SAME FLOWERS AND FILL THE WHOLE AREA
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO CONNECT THE TWO SAME FLOWERS AND FILL THE WHOLE AREA
